entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.58.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix homekit name length by @bertrandda in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2277
  • Improve README, CONTRIBUTING & SUPPORT documentation by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2278
  • Zigbee2mqtt: Fix laggy search on device page by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2284
  • MQTT: Fix laggy search in device page by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2283
  • Scene: In condition on variables, can delete first condition if there… by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2282
  • Fix local websocket race condition that causes flicker on dashboard by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2287
  • Cicoub13: feat scene actions button 2 by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2281
  • Dashboard: Add button to add widget at position by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2280
  • [zWaveJS] Support for Meter values (Energy consumption) by @sescandell in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2285
  • Scene: Add action group button by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2279
  • Scene: Add AI answer to variable by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2289
  • Dashboard: Not controllable MQTT devices should be displayed as sensor + fix MQTT placeholder in scenes by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2291
  • Dashboard: Should display light widget control only if there is more than 2 lights by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2292
  • Alarm: Partial arm should lock tablets by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2293
  • Scene: Delay now supports calculated value + random values by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2294
  • Zigbee2mqtt: Add level sensor Tuya ME201WZ by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2286
  • Scene: Preserve filters after deleting scene by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2295
  • MQTT: Custom topics should support text feature by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2297
  • MQTT: Add missing isUsed by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2298
  • Dashboard: Chart should let the user select an aggregate function instead of the default (average) by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2290
  • Dashboard: Add gauge widget by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2296
  • Send message to user with release note when Gladys was upgraded by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2300
  • Chart: Add group by by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2299
  • Matter integration by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2264
  • Upgrade matter/main to 0.13.0 in devDependencies by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2301

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.57.0...v4.58.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.58.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • MQTT: Fix bug where custom listener params weren’t cleaned up after feature deletion by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2305
  • Disable upgrade check in tests by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2306
  • Matter pairing code can be 21 characters by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2307
  • Matter: Fix cover unit by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2308
  • Chart: Calculate variation and last value using aggregate function by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2309
  • Fix integration page refresh category bug & refactor top stop using unistore by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2310

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.58.0...v4.58.1

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.59.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Matter: Fix illuminance measurement conversion by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2313
  • Scene: Fix variable path label on "Condition on variable" action by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2314
  • Scene: Fix variable bug when using more than 9 actions before injecting a variable by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2315
  • Bluetooth: Upgrade @abandonware/noble to 1.9.2-26 by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2319
  • ChatGPT: When asking the AI, should send better context by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2316
  • Update DeviceGetValueParams to handle text device feature type by @Terdious in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2317
  • Matter : Add controller backup by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2320
  • Camera: Increase get camera image timeout to 20 seconds by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2325
  • Matter : Display serial number & unique_id in UI by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2321
  • Zigbee2mqtt: Add Aqara W100 buttons by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2326

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.58.1...v4.59.0
